import { ChangeEvent, useState } from "react" const App = (): JSX.Element => { const [term, setTerm] = useState('') const [options, setOptions] = useState<[]>([]); const getSearchOptions = (value: string) => { fetch(`http://api.openweathermap.org/geo/1.0/direct?q=${value.trim()},&limit=5&appid=${process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY}`) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data) => console.setOptions({data})) } const onInputChange = (ev: ChangeEvent) => { const value = ev.target.value.trim(); setTerm(value); if(value === '') return getSearchOptions(value) } return (
